name: green-ups
description: Providing the most up to data climate change information comes Climatize. Using our website you can figure out what steps you can take to help bring back our environment to a point of stabilty. You can view the latest news regarding climate change and  you can see the most recent changes climate change from aggregated sources of scientific research.
author: Rahul Vig, Vlad Golitsyn, Kira Helburg. Teddy Passias, Bernadette Cordero-Bension
